column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Kuvira says : " What happened ?
#Text=All the energy from your weapon tore open a new portal and blasted us in here .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Why would you save my life , after everything I did to you ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I guess ... I see a lot of myself in you .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " We are nothing alike !
#Text=" Korra says : " Yes , we are .
#Text=We 're both fierce and determined to succeed , sometimes without thinking things through .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " This was n't how I wanted things to end .
#Text=If you would have all just surrendered , none of this would have happened .
#Text=" Korra says : " You brought this on yourself .
#Text=Messing with the spirit vines , acting like a dictator over your people ... you had to know what you were doing was n't right .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " I was trying to help my people .
#Text=Su turned her back on the Earth Kingdom , you were gone !
#Text=I had to do something .
#Text=" Korra says : " I think I get it now .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " You do n't understand anything about me .
#Text=" Korra says : " I do .
#Text=Su told me how she took you in when you were younger .
#Text=It must have been so hard being an orphan .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Do n't pretend you know what it felt like !
#Text=The Avatar is adored by millions !
#Text=I was cast aside by my own parents like I meant nothing to them .
#Text=How could I just stand by and watch the same thing happen to my nation , when it needed someone to guide it ?
#Text=" Korra says : " You wanted to create a place where you and your people would never be vulnerable again .
#Text=I may not have been an orphan , but believe me , I understand what it feels like to be afraid .
#Text=After I was poisoned , I would have done anything to feel in control .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " The spirits have returned .
#Text=" Asami says : " And so has Korra !
#Text=" Bolin says : " You 're okay !
#Text=" Mecha suit captain says : " Release Kuvira , or we will attack !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Stand down .
#Text=This battle is over .
#Text=I owe the Avatar my life .
#Text=Her power is beyond anything I could ever hope to achieve .
#Text=I 'll accept whatever punishment the world sees fit .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " And Su , I 'm sorry for all the anguish I 've caused you and your family .
#Text=" Suyin says : " You 're going to answer for everything you 've done .
#Text=" Bolin says : " And though the battle took a severe toll on our beloved city , out of the destruction , love did bloom !
#Text=So that is why , dearest friends and family , we gather today to celebrate the wondrous , and at time inexplicable bond between Sir Varrick and the Lady Zhu Li !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Hey , pal , camera on me !
#Text=This is my big day !
#Text=" Bolin says : " True love is a fickle creature .
#Text=Difficult to find , nearly impossible to tame .
#Text=But Varrick and Zhu Li have proven that even the longest of long shots can have a chance at happiness together .
#Text=Now , for the vows !
#Text=Thank you , Master Pabu .
#Text=Do you , Sir Iknik Blackstone Varrick of the Southern Water Tribe , Master of the High Seas , take the Lady Zhu Li Moon to be your lawfully wedded wife ?
#Text=Will you promise to treat her not as your assistant , but as your honored and cherished partner ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " You 're darn tootin ' I do !
#Text=" Bolin says : " And do you , Zhu Li , take Varrick , to be your lawfully wedded husband ?
#Text=Do you promise to care for him , in sickness and in health , and also scrub his callouses on a bi-weekly basis , which ... is n't really that much to ask ... Okay , I 'm not reading all this .
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " I do take Varrick .
#Text=Callouses and all .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You may now do the thing .
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Are you all right ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " You just make me so dang happy !
#Text="
